name: [ prodigal child ]
description:
The gifts you gave your children have been squandered.
For if it were not for the sin in their heart already,
the stitches from time's allowance would not come unraveled. 
 
Our children's dreams are fulfilled, 
and differ rarely from the struggles of any other.

In an effort to commune with the Holy Spirit,
 that part of our whole being which has become lost further
 as we journey farther retracing steps merely sketched 
in memories scattered across the divide... 

We are left with the burning light of the family home.  
In a fervent effort to escape the id 
[the prison of one's subconscious mind]
The child burns it down and with all or nothing 

By Curse or by Blessing, 
A journey has begun
